storyInfo: Kal'tsit recalls past events related to the doctor. Does this familiar yet foreign person really deserve her trust? The time to make an emotional choice has come.

attributes.content: My words don't matter much. Only when you live free, in every moment, are you truly alive.
Go and experience the world for yourself. It will take many months to form your own ideas.
Kal'tsit, I hope you will...
5:39 P.M. \ Clear
Outdoors, Rhodes Island Deck
You've been quite busy lately, right? There are many things you have to do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Proper rest is also necessary. There have been some small fluctuations in your psychological indicators as of late, and I will continue to monitor them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right, Blaze will be here to give you a report tonight. She was the one who led the raid yesterday.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 1:23 A.M. \ Rainy
Babel Temporary Operational Command Center
Scout's outside, he was in charge of last night's operation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is the record of one of his rare mission failures since enlisting in Babel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Commander, Dame, you're both here. Let me briefly explain what happened last night.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: When my squad was sweeping the battlefield, they found traces of enemy troops that could be tracked. I made the decision that this was an opportunity to sniff out the enemy's position, insisted on giving chase, and ended up being ambushed.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: The responsibility is mine alone, and I am willing to accept the army's punishment.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: This is not a decision an old Sarkaz mercenary would make.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Regrettably, all my experience failed to let me know anything was wrong.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Something has to actually happen for your experience to be worth anything. You lost no team members after the crisis occurred, indicating that your command was calm as you retreated, and thus proper.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You deserve recognition, not punishment.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I don't understand how you reached this conclusion.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Army discipline loses all meaning if it fails to recognize when to reward and when to punish. You know that, Scout.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Why do you care so much about her reputation? I need a reason.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit, how's Reyka?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: She's out of danger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Scout opens his mouth to say something, but words fail him.
Your heart is in turmoil. Rarely have I seen you struggle like this, even on the battlefield. If you can tell us what you're thinking, maybe we can...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I insist that Reyka not be punished in any way.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Because she's an orphan? Military discipline isn't a bleeding heart operation.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Reyka's father was a Sarkaz mercenary who died in the civil war.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: She's in good company in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Her mother suffered from severe Oripathy and was unable to raise her. Upon learning about this, Her Majesty Theresa has been providing financial support to their family.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Nothing special about that either. If you don't have any better reason...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Reyka only enlisted in the army to repay Her Majesty's kindness.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: She once told me that fighting for Her Majesty is her only wish and the entire purpose of her life...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Go on, Scout. I'm listening.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: In Kazdel, it is rare for children to have any wishes, or anything to protect.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: They get sucked into the maelstrom of war, and then they die.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: So you hope to preserve Reyka's reputation, to keep her wish to protect Her Majesty alive.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Scout cannot answer, the battle-tested veteran falls back into silence.
The Doctor rises slowly, reaching out to pat Scout on the shoulder. Kal'tsit does not expect this.
Sorry if that offended you. I knew you must've had a good reason.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: No one will be punished. But that will have an impact on discipline, which isn't going to be popular.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Scout, I hope that in the future, you and your team will respond to doubt with action.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I swear to do this. Commander, Dame, I'll be taking my leave.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Promise me one thing before you go. Value your own life and reputation the same as you do your teammates.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Additionally... Closure may approach you to discuss the Londinium issue. She's very concerned about my position on this matter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can share some more of the decision-making process with her. After all, she is also a potential combat operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, you can also discuss... other things.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 11:27 A.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Chief Engineer's Office
What is it this time?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm wondering if you've settled on the going-to-Londinium thing?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm still discussing it, as the action itself is rather risky. Why are you suddenly so concerned about this?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm worried you're not in the right headspace. I know you want to go, deep down, but you gotta think about the kind of danger we're up against.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You waste a lot of energy getting all torn up.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm not torn up. Rhodes Island's safety is always my first priority.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It'd be great if one day, you could just do whatever you want.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You can't put it past me. I know how close you are to Theresa. There's no way you can stay out of the Londinium thingy.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with Her Majesty. I only care about the pros and cons that the action itself has on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah yeah, I know, always responsibility and duty. Take a day to treat yourself every once in a while.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Leave all the boring stuff to the Doctor, and let's knock some back, just the two of us. Doesn't that sound nice?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The Doctor is already working very hard.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I guess that's true. You'd think the amnesia would give us an all new Doctor, but the workaholic part is still the same.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But honestly, the old Doctor was such a hardass, I like the new version better.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Because this one's easier to bully?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I heard about the treadmill you gave the Doctor, how it would start floating for no reason, and you had to watch ads to get it back down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That was a special promotion! I was trying to save the Doctor money.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I need you to be more considerate. The last thing I need is an overwhelmed Doctor getting scared to death by levitating exercise equipment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, sure. Why so serious all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Maybe it's something about how I knew the old Doctor, but I keep getting this uncontrollable urge to pull the most hilarious pranks.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Especially before, when the Doctor was acting weirder and weirder...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Enough, Closure. No more on this subject. I forbid you from mentioning a word of this to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm not that clueless. By the way, Kal'tsit, before we go to Londinium, I'm going to carry out a renovation of the 'under-development area.' Gotta thicken that hull, at least.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It'll be pricey, but I, a reliable engineer that I am, think that level of investment is still absolutely necessary.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So, on behalf of the Engineering Department, I've decided to fight for three days and nights to give the 'under-development area' a brand new look!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No need. The 'under-development area' is the sturdiest place on the ship.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hehe, I thought you'd say that. Right below the 'under-development area' is a drone hangar, and that hangar doesn't have any support pillars.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Once we knock out the upper part, the top of the hangar will deform, and then...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, why are you glaring at me like that? I'm scared!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You just want to do your own thing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright, cards on the table. I'm the chief engineer, of course I'm gonna be curious about some place I can't get into.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I have my reasons.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All those secrets in your gullet are gonna suffocate you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: When are you going to open up to me already? You can't carry this all by yourself.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Maybe... that day will come.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, huh? Did you just say something not super uptight?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The patient placement work for Connor County will be completed today. In the coming days, you'll once again need to reassess the defensive strength of the settlement site.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Medical Department will forward the relevant data to you later.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the future, similar tasks will gradually be transferred over to elite operators so that your energy will not be diverted from more important issues.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sorry to barge in, but look alive, everyone. Dr. Kal'tsit is about to start her daily rounds.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: She's earlier than usual today, huh... Eh? There's a bunch of logistics department folks as well.
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: You should go see Dr. Kal'tsit about that forgetfulness of yours.
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected B

attributes.content: That lass from the Medical Department came over to our ward for a week or so to touch bases, and said that she was going to transfer all of us to a temporary medical settlement in Connor County. What's the point of other people talking if you're not gonna remember a word of it?
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected B

attributes.content: Haha, don't worry, sir. After all, the arrangement was made rather hastily.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'll be reminding everyone again, the Rhodes Island landship will be conducting a series of mock exercises around Victoria in the near future.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We've decided to temporarily transfer you to a medical settlement in Connor County out of consideration for your safety.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Please rest assured that the medical facilities there are comprehensive, and you will be accompanied by most of the medical staff.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Look, now that's Ari
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: Gaaaah, Dr. Kal'tsit! How long have you been standing right next to me?
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: Don't worry. I just got here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ari, pass me this patient's blood works report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm, you've recovered quickly and your Oripathy hasn't shown any signs of deterioration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The fact that I'm still here today is all thanks to you. When I think back to the day I first had an acute Oripathy attack, you didn't close your eyes day or night so you could rescue me. I just...
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: It's my duty as a doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Next, I'll have to read the relevant agreement on the transfer and resettlement, and you'll sign the agreement after I read it. According to Article 4 of Rhodes Island's Oripathy and Treatment Regulations...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Easy there, Doctor, you don't have to read all that. Rhodes Island has my complete and total trust, so just show me where I have to sign.
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: I appreciate it, but reading out the agreement in its entirety is also to protect your rights.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ari, time is short, and we might not have the manpower to carry the patients. Check the hallway to see if anyone can help.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor? Good afternoon, what brings you here?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Doctor, are you available right now? We don't have enough staff to relocate the patients here, and might need your help...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.options: I am.;Sure.;I'd be glad to help.

attributes.content: Given your current physical condition, I'd recommend you not engage in any physical labor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I've got nothing better to do.;I'll do my best.;At least let me give it a shot! Don't underestimate me!

attributes.content: Doctor... This isn't the commander of Rhodes Island, is it? The one that Little Ari's always talking about every day?
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected B

attributes.content: S-Sir, please don't say silly things like that! Doctor, I was just giving them an overview of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.options: She's probably giving me too much credit.;......;Am I really that popular?

attributes.content: Having the commander of Rhodes Island transport me? There's no way...
attributes.name: Ordinary Infected A

attributes.content: Now don't be shy. Everyone in Rhodes Island is obligated to help in even the most commonplace of tasks. That hardly changes even for the person with the title of field commander.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Our time is limited. Let's get the transfer underway.;Saves time.;Let's get a move-on.
Qus, come here and help me lift his upper body, and pay attention to the medical equipment cable.

attributes.content: Sure thing. Ari, what's this new device? Never seen it before.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.options: It's a crystal melting instrument, Rhine Lab CR-01 experimental model, with a built-in Originium circuit.
In the middle and late stages of Oripathy, the body becomes filled with crystals, and the organs are easily damaged and ruptured.
The crystal melting instrument utilizes the sequential release of concentrated energy to dissolve the crystallization.

attributes.content: That's exactly right! See, it's just as I said, the Doctor really knows everything.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.options: Qus, don't just lift like that.;Qus, stop.;Qus, hold on!
Use your left hand to place the patient's hands together over the side of your neck, then use your right hand to cradle both the patient's legs...

attributes.content: S-Sorry...! I didn't pay very close attention to Dr. Kal'tsit's battlefield handling course, and didn't learn a lot of that material...
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: That course was originally structured for you to cement your knowledge with practice anyway. But how did you know that, Doctor? If I recall, you were out in Sargon during that session.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It came out without thinking.;......;Maybe I'm just a genius.

attributes.content: One last thing, Amiya's been busy with various assessments of the Londinium trip as of late. Please take the time to make sure you look after her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She may be the leader of Rhodes Island, but she is also still a kid.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 2:29 A.M. \ Overcast
Babel Temporary Operational Command Center
You are the leader of Babel, but you're also an Oripathy patient. Please take your health seriously.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I suggest you stop working and take a break immediately.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you still think too much about others... Oh, Doctor, please come in. We weren't discussing anything confidential.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I heard everything, Your Majesty. You really should be getting enough sleep.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: That was a tense meeting we had last night. All that battle talk must have tired you out.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: No worries. Conversely, Doctor, I would like to apologize for the words spoken by some of the participants. They did not intend to offend, but were slightly agitated.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: They were worried about my safety, but I understand that you must surely have considered all possible situations. This is the best solution.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresis wants to regain the initiative. He knows that your strengths are also your weaknesses.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But what he doesn't know is how much you're willing to sacrifice for the Sarkaz people.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: When Ascalon's troops arrive in town, he'll see the writing on the wall.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You're always so reassuring. Doctor, listening to your words is more refreshing than sleeping.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa's weary face flashes a smile of relief, a smile that becomes gentler as she looks out the door.
Come in. Here, sit next to me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: B-But...
attributes.name: Small Cautus

attributes.content: No need to look all around. There are no outsiders here, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit, g-good evening.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I didn't mean to stay up this late.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No one is blaming you, dear. Let me guess, did you have a nightmare?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No... I didn't. The soldiers moving around woke me up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was looked out the window and saw Ascalon getting ready for a long trip with the other fighters...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They are on a mission.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But... But, Ascalon said she would never leave me or Her Majesty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was worried, so I snuck in here to take a look...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, my dear Amiya, the Doctor gave Ascalon a little job. They'll be back soon enough.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Think about it, has one of the Doctor's battles ever run long?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Y-You're right.. If that's what Doctor wants, I feel much better.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor is the best at making everyone feel safe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, you should rest.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Okay I'm going to bed! Good night, everyone!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What a sweet, lovable child...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor, before you came, I was a bit worried... about the safety of the Rhodes Island landship in Ascalon's absence.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That's natural.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Stretching his front line thin, encircling a small town with no strategic significance. There's no telling what Theresis's true objective is.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: My safety is secondary. I'm more concerned about the safety of the children and researchers on the ship.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But as Amiya said, you really do give people a sense of security. What you've accomplished through your command leaves no room for doubt.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor, Kal'tsit, the day we win this war... shouldn't be far away, right?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Now, all of that is well outside your normal schedule...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, are you still listening?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, what does it mean to be truly alive?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Where did that come from?;Never thought about it...;Way too abstract.

attributes.content: Obeying someone else's will, losing your reason to move on. Does that count as being alive?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: That's just a walking corpse.;......;Isn't that just a robot?

attributes.content: Keeping your body, but being separated from your memories. Does that count as being alive?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: That might make life rather confusing.;......;Are you talking about me?

attributes.content: If you had to choose one or the other, Doctor, which would you choose?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I choose to be human, not a puppet.;I would choose to be free.;Who wants to be a robot?

attributes.text: Kal'tsit casts a deeply pensive look at you.

attributes.content: Freedom is not free.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After you lost your memories, you woke up, were forced to fight, and forced to witness the sacrifice of human life. This whole time, you have barely had a single choice...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Look into my eyes... Tell me, Doctor, why is it that you fight?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Memories continue to pour forth in this moment, and everything that has happened since your awakening in Chernobog flashes before your eyes vividly, joy and sorrow intertwining.
An answer becomes clearer and clearer in your mind. You almost blurt it out subconsciously

attributes.options: I am fighting against my destiny.;I fight for Rhodes Island.;I fight to protect this world.

attributes.content: Make sure you don't forget the answer you just gave me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if no one understands, we must continue to walk this path.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, you too will find your path.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
